name: Vero Cookie Clicker
description:
Welcome to arthritis simulator, *cough* I mean Vero Cookie Clicker! In this game, you will be clicking on a cookie and getting coins. But, you might be asking "what makes this better than traditional Cookie Clickers? Well, WITH EVERY SINGLE CLICK YOU MAKE THE GAME GENERATES A NEW UNIQUE NFT. Just kidding, I'm not that stupid, this is a basic game, not an environment-killing factory.

Note: I'm not really planning to update it unless the game pops off. I'm not trying to pressure people into 5-staring, I'm just letting everyone know that I'm 80% sure there isn't gonna be an update.
